game.name: Santa's Burnout
game.shortDescription: Santa has officially quit. The kids are too spoiled, and the magic is gone. This year, the Toy Factory has been converted into a strip mine. Click rocks, crush hope, and manage a cynical coal mining operation in this dark industrial idle game. Your goal? Ensure everyone gets coal for Christmas.
